name: vbrahma
tag_list: video, media, share, collect, webpver, continuity, aggregate, sharing
overview:
vBrahma provides a webPvr service for all the online media.

In the initial launch users will be able to aggregate their online video content as they browse at different sites, using the Firefox only plugin. The vBrahma team has really simplified the way online video is collected.

As a introduction to webPvr service and continuity, they are supporting couple of sites where users can just pause the video, and then resume it from same point from vBrahma site. Very useful in case of long videos. The context of viewing just carried.

In the next stage they are working on providing the continuity service on other media including online live content and continuity across windows mobile device and PC’s.

The team is enthusiastic about the future growth and services that can be built around the concept.

Currently they are scouting for Angel investors to fund their expansion plans.
